plot: Nate (Chuck Church) hits a dog with his car and must decide whether or not he should tell its lonely owner (Dana Powell) about the accident.
title: Pepper
plot_es: Nate (Chuck Church) hits a dog with his car and must decide whether or not he should tell its lonely owner (Dana Powell) about the accident.
plot_en: Nate (Chuck Church) hits a dog with his car and must decide whether or not he should tell its lonely owner (Dana Powell) about the accident.
